snippet: Two police partners embarked one evening on a journey into a parallel world, a backstage apart from Broadway’s gloss that most visitors never glimpse or even consider.
abstract: New York City police officers from the Midtown South Precinct journey every evening into a parallel world as they patrol Times Square, a backstage apart from the Broadway that most tourists never glimpse or consider; Officers Liza Hemme and Martin Reyes have patrolled the area as partners for the better part of the past decade (Series: Summer Nights).
lead_paragraph: Two police partners embarked one evening on a journey into a parallel world, a backstage apart from Broadway’s gloss that most visitors never glimpse or even consider.

headline.seo: For Times Square Police, a Stage Tourists Don’t See
headline.main: For Times Square Patrol, a Stage the Tourists Don’t See
headline.print_headline: For Times Sq. Patrol, a Stage the Tourists Don’t See
